page.title: 08Why we stay in Colmonell
page.content: We moved to Colmonell some eleven years ago because it was more central for my husband's agricultural work and also because my husband had spent his childhood in arural area and did not really settle in Girvan. I like living in Colmonell now although at first I found it very difficult because it was a very close knit community. I find like all rural areas that we are deprived of some essential services eg.doctors,dentist. The public transport to this area is poor and I feel for me it is essential to have some means of transport of my own. I feel that rural life is sheltered and the children especially do not have acces to the same social activities which town children have.
